select count(*) from point_logs where user_id = #{userId} and
polg_date > to_date(#{sdate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and polg_date < to_date(#{edate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

select count(otoq_num) from oto_questions join oto_categories on (oto_questions.otoc_num = oto_categories.otoc_num) where ((otoq_content like '%' || #{otoqContent} || '%') or (otoq_title like '%' || #{otoqContent} || '%')) and user_id = #{userId} order by oto_questions.otoq_num desc

select.if: select count(godr_num) from goods_reviews where (godr_content like '%' || #{godrContent} || '%') and user_id = #{userId}

select count(godr_num) from goods_reviews join goods on (goods_reviews.god_num = goods.god_num) where (godr_content like '%' || #{godrContent} || '%') and (goods.godc_num = #{godcNum}) and user_id = #{userId}
select count(godq_num) from goods_questions where godq_content like '%' || #{godqContent} || '%' and user_id = #{userId}

select count(goods_questions.godq_num) from goods_questions join goods on (goods_questions.god_num = goods.god_num) where godc_num = #{godqType} and godq_content like '%' || #{godqContent} || '%' and user_id = #{userId}
